<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When you come into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>, then shall the land <S%H7673>keep<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> in the fruit <S%H8393>there<s%>;

But in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: you shall neither <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field<s%>, nor <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.

And the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H5650>you<s%>; for you, and for your servant, and for your <S%H519>maid<s%>, and for your hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, and for your <S%H8453>stranger<s%> that stays with <S%H1481>you<s%>,
And for your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and for the <S%H2416>animal<s%> that are in your <S%H776>land<s%>, shall all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> there be <S%H398>food<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> unto <S%H7651>you<s%>, seven <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and the <S%H3117>space<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> shall be unto you <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

Then shall you cause the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> of the <S%H8643>jubile<s%> to <S%H5674>sound<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> shall you make the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H5674>sound<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> unto all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H3104>there<s%>: it shall be a jubile unto <S%H7725>you<s%>; and you shall return every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>, and you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H4940>family<s%>.

For it is the <S%H3104>jubile<s%>; it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>: you shall eat the <S%H8393>increase<s%> there out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of this <S%H3104>jubile<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if you <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4465>ought<s%> unto your <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>, or <S%H7069>buy<s%> ought of your <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, you shall not <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>:

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubile<s%> you shall <S%H7069>buy<s%> of your <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>, and according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> he shall sell unto <S%H4376>you<s%>:

<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> <S%H6310>there<s%>, and according to the <S%H4591>fewness<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H4591>diminish<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> of <S%H4557>it<s%>: for according to the number of the years of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> does he sell unto <S%H4376>you<s%>.
You shall not therefore <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another<s%>; but you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in it in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
And if you shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>? <S%H2232>behold<s%>, we shall not sow, nor <S%H622>gather<s%> in our <S%H8393>increase<s%>:

Then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and it shall bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> yet of <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> until the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>; until her <S%H8393>fruits<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the old <S%H3465>store<s%>.
The <S%H776>land<s%> shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H6783>ever<s%>: for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1616>my<s%>; for you are strangers and strangers with <S%H8453>me<s%>.
And in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> you shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

If your <S%H251>brother<s%> be grown <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and has <S%H4376>sold<s%> away some of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, and if any of his <S%H7138>kin<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350>it<s%>, then shall he redeem that which his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4465>sold<s%>.
And if the <S%H376>man<s%> have none to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>it<s%>, and himself be <S%H1767>able<s%> to redeem <S%H4672>it<s%>;

Then let him <S%H2803>count<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> <S%H7725>there<s%>, and restore the <S%H5736>surplus<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom he <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>; that he may return unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, may the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1353>redeem<s%> at any <S%H5769>time<s%>.

And if a man <S%H1350>purchase<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the year of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>: for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you no <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H8636>him<s%>, or increase: but <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; that your <S%H251>brother<s%> may live with <S%H2416>you<s%>.
